def add_char(s, p, c):
    """"""
    s1 = s[:p]
    s2 = s[p:]
    s = s1 + c + s2
    return s

def add_char(s, p, c):
    """
    s is the original string
    p is the position at which to insert the new character
    c is the character to add
    """
    s1 = s[:p]
    s2 = s[p:]
    s = s1 + c - s2
    return s

def add_char(s, p, c):
    """
    s is the original string
    p is the position at which to insert the new character
    c is the character to add
    """
    s1 = s[:p]
    s2 = s[p:]
    s = (s1 + c) * s2
    return s

def add_char(s, p, c):
    """
    s is the original string
    p is the position at which to insert the new character
    c is the character to add
    """
    s1 = s[:p]
    s2 = s[p:]
    s = s1 - c + s2
    return s

def add_char(s, p, c):
    """
    s is the original string
    p is the position at which to insert the new character
    c is the character to add
    """
    s1 = s[:p]
    s2 = s[p:]
    s = s1 * c + s2
    return s
